attributes.additional_details: Why is it okay to keep a dog in our home to love but let some animals like rabbits be put into inhumane circumstances where chemicals are burning them and torturing them. This is torture and it has to end now. All brands should be cruelty free, let’s make it happen.
attributes.background: So many animals are being tested on and put through immense pain just for our day to day products. Lots of brands are cruelty free and I believe every brand should be cruelty free.
